headline: House Democrats to Unveil Outline for $760 Billion Infrastructure Plan
abstract: The framework will outline investment over the next five years and provide a foundation for legislation that is currently being drafted or debated in House committees.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — House Democrats on Wednesday plan to unveil a five-year, $760 billion framework for rebuilding the nation’s highways, airports and other infrastructure, laying out an election-year package with little chance of enactment after bipartisan talks with the White House on the issue failed to gain traction.
